products.name: Cheerios
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, extruded cereals
products.facts: ["Cheerios are made primarily from whole grain oats, which are a good source of fiber.","The packaging for Cheerios is recyclable, helping to reduce environmental impact.","Cheerios are low in sugar, containing only 1 gram of sugar per serving, making them a healthier breakfast option.","The brand is committed to sourcing oats from sustainable farms, supporting ecological farming practices."]

products.facts: ["Nutella is made primarily from sugar, palm oil, hazelnuts, cocoa solids, and skimmed milk powder.","The palm oil used in Nutella is sourced from sustainable plantations to minimize environmental impact.","Nutella is certified by the Rainforest Alliance, promoting sustainable farming practices.","The quality of Nutella is maintained through strict quality control measures, ensuring consistency and safety in every jar."]

products.facts: ["Jif Creamy Peanut Butter is made from roasted peanuts, sugar, hydrogenated vegetable oil, and salt.","The packaging for Jif Peanut Butter is recyclable, promoting environmental sustainability.","Jif sources its peanuts primarily from the United States, ensuring quality and freshness.","The product is gluten-free and contains no artificial preservatives, enhancing its quality and health appeal."]
